fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select two sets of three players. You will use a random ability from a random player in the first set on a random target in the second set.
- Once per game, at any time, use a random ability in the game randomly.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Good things always seem to happen to you. RNG is skewed in your favour. This applies while dead.
- Each time this role is kept, its chance to roll increases by 1.
